en.title: FusionExcel's Achievers Recognition Dinner, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, 11th April 2009 (1)
en.content:
FusionExcel's Achievers Recognition Dinner held at MAEPS, Serdang, Malaysia on 11th April 2009 was a GREAT SUCCESS with 1,400 Leaders, Members, VIPs and Invited Guests. FusionExcel's Spokesmen, former World Number 1 Badminton Champion Foo Kok Keong and Champion Bodybuilder Wong Hong and Spokeswoman, Champion Power Lifter Ms Law were among the attendees. There were participants from many countries including Singapore, Indonesia, Philippines, Taiwan, India, Nepal, Bangladesh, Canada, Australia, Thailand, Ghana, Switzerland, Turkey, etc.

The event started with a procession of FusionExcel's Presidential Directors, led by FusionExcel Founder CEO Paul Ting and Founder Director KS Lee onto the stage. The Discovery 9 Pieces Combo Band provided entertainment. 

HIGHLIGHTS OF THE EVENT INCLUDE:

- Opening Speech by FusionExcel Founder Director KS Lee.

- Welcome gifts by FusionExcel Founder CEO Paul Ting to FusionExcel's latest Country Licensees, Mr Hugo 
  Risi, Mrs Chato Risi (Switzerland) and Rev Freddie E Oji, Rev Juliana Oji (Ghana). FusionExcel's family is 
  spreading bigger around theworld with more than 40 Country Licensees now!

- Quantum Pendant Demonstration by FusionExcel Presidential Director KC Phoon which never fails to
  impress the newcomers. Thank you, KC!

- Mock Cheque RM 20,000 presentation by FusionExcel Founder CEO Paul Ting and Founder Director KS Lee
  toPersatuan Budi Penyayang Daerah Bentong represented by it's Founder Chong Tuck Meng who gave a 
  speech in appreciation of FusionExcel.

- Presentation of Open University Malaysia Certificates to participants of the ProFusionExcelssional Network
  Marketing training program conducted by Dr BN Edwards in March 2009. A total of 81 FusionExcel
  Memberssuccessfully attended and completed the program. The certificates were conFusionExcelrred to 
  the participants by Encik Hamzah Shafiee from the Open University Malaysia. Congratulations! 

- Speech by Presidential Director Dr Mohd Fadil Samion, who really fired up the audience with his sharing! 

- Installation of new Directors, Executive Directors and Presidential Directors! 

- Motivation sharing by new Presidential Directors, the youngest of whom is 23 years old Aaron Siew! 
  This proves that age is not a barrier to success for FusionExcel leaders. Congratulations to all!

- Motivation sharing by FusionExcel's dynamic globetrotting Presidential Director, Rachel Thomas.
  You are truly a great leader, Rachel! 

- Closing speech by FusionExcel's dynamic Presidential Director KC Phoon who as usual inspired the 
  audience with his sharing! 

- Lucky Draws.

FusionExcel would like to thank MC Lovey Lee and her team for a wonderful job.

SEE YOU ALL AT THE TOP! AHOO! AHOO! AHOO!!
< Click here for more photos >

meta.description:
FE's Achievers Recognition Dinner held at MAEPS, Serdang, Malaysia on 11th April 2009 was a GREAT SUCCESS with 1,400 Leaders, Members, VIPs and invited guests. FE's Spokesmen, former World No 1 Badminton Champion Foo Kok Keong and Champion Bodybuilder Wong Hong and Spokeswoman, Champion Powerlifter Ms Law were among the attendees.There were participants from many countries including Singapore, Indonesia, Philippines, Taiwan, India, Nepal, Bangladesh, Canada, Australia, Thailand, Ghana, Switzerland, Turkey, etc.
The event started with a procession of FE's Presidential Directors, led by FE Founder CEO Paul Ting and Founder Director KS Lee onto the stage. Entertainment was provided by The Discovery 9 Piece Combo Band. Highlights of the event include:
- Opening Speech by FE Founder Director KS Lee.
- Welcome gifts by FE Founder CEO Paul Ting to FE's latest Country Licensees, Mr Hugo Risi, Mrs Chato Risi
(Switzerland) and Rev Freddie E Oji, Rev Juliana Oji (Ghana). FE's family is spreading bigger around the
world with more than 40 Country Licensees now!
- Quantum Pendant Demo by FE Presidential Director KC Phoon which never fails to impress the newcomers.
Thank you, KC!
- Mock Cheque RM 20,000 presentation by FE Founder CEO Paul Ting and Founder Director KS Lee to
Persatuan Budi Penyayang Daerah Bentong represented by it's Founder Chong Tuck Meng who gave a
speech in appreciation of FE.
- Presentation of Open University Malaysia Certificates to participants of the Professional Network
Marketing training programme conducted by Dr BN Edwards in March 2009. A total of 81 FE members
successfully attended and completed the programme. The certificates were conferred to the participants
by Encik Hamzah Shafiee from the Open University Malaysia. Congratulations!
- Speech by Presidential Director Dr Mohd Fadil Samion, who really fired up the audience with his sharing!
- Installation of new Directors, Executive Directors and Presidential Directors!
- Motivation sharing by new Presidential Directors, the youngest of whom is 23 year old Aaron Siew! This
proves that age is not a barrier to success for FE leaders. Congratulations to all!
- Motivation sharing by FE's dynamic globetrotting Presidential Director, Rachel Thomas. You are truely a
great leader, Rachel!
- Closing speech by FE's dynamic Presidential Director KC Phoon who as usual inspired the audience with his
sharing!
- Lucky Draws.
FE would like to thank MC Lovey Lee and her team for a wonderful job.
SEE YOU ALL AT THE TOP! AHOO! AHOO! AHOO!!

bm.title: FusionExcel's Achievers Recognition Dinner, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, 11th April 2009 (1)

meta.description:
FE's Achievers Recognition Dinner held at MAEPS, Serdang, Malaysia on 11th April 2009 was a GREAT SUCCESS with 1,400 Leaders, Members, VIPs and invited guests. FE's Spokesmen, former World No 1 Badminton Champion Foo Kok Keong and Champion Bodybuilder Wong Hong and Spokeswoman, Champion Powerlifter Ms Law were among the attendees.There were participants from many countries including Singapore, Indonesia, Philippines, Taiwan, India, Nepal, Bangladesh, Canada, Australia, Thailand, Ghana, Switzerland, Turkey, etc.
The event started with a procession of FE's Presidential Directors, led by FE Founder CEO Paul Ting and Founder Director KS Lee onto the stage. Entertainment was provided by The Discovery 9 Piece Combo Band. Highlights of the event include:
- Opening Speech by FE Founder Director KS Lee.
- Welcome gifts by FE Founder CEO Paul Ting to FE's latest Country Licensees, Mr Hugo Risi, Mrs Chato Risi
(Switzerland) and Rev Freddie E Oji, Rev Juliana Oji (Ghana). FE's family is spreading bigger around the
world with more than 40 Country Licensees now!
- Quantum Pendant Demo by FE Presidential Director KC Phoon which never fails to impress the newcomers.
Thank you, KC!
- Mock Cheque RM 20,000 presentation by FE Founder CEO Paul Ting and Founder Director KS Lee to
Persatuan Budi Penyayang Daerah Bentong represented by it's Founder Chong Tuck Meng who gave a
speech in appreciation of FE.
- Presentation of Open University Malaysia Certificates to participants of the Professional Network
Marketing training programme conducted by Dr BN Edwards in March 2009. A total of 81 FE members
successfully attended and completed the programme. The certificates were conferred to the participants
by Encik Hamzah Shafiee from the Open University Malaysia. Congratulations!
- Speech by Presidential Director Dr Mohd Fadil Samion, who really fired up the audience with his sharing!
- Installation of new Directors, Executive Directors and Presidential Directors!
- Motivation sharing by new Presidential Directors, the youngest of whom is 23 year old Aaron Siew! This
proves that age is not a barrier to success for FE leaders. Congratulations to all!
- Motivation sharing by FE's dynamic globetrotting Presidential Director, Rachel Thomas. You are truely a
great leader, Rachel!
- Closing speech by FE's dynamic Presidential Director KC Phoon who as usual inspired the audience with his
sharing!
- Lucky Draws.
FE would like to thank MC Lovey Lee and her team for a wonderful job.
SEE YOU ALL AT THE TOP! AHOO! AHOO! AHOO!!
